void BDB_ConfigureInstallCode (ExtAddr_t deviceAddress, uint8_t *installCode, IcStatusCallback_t pfCallback)
 bdb Public API to configure Install Code This API calculates the CRC for the install code and compare with the given CRC Derives the link key using SSP AES and sets the key in APS Key Pair Set

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum InstallCode_Configuration_Status_t
Enumerator:
IC_CONFIG_SUCCESS 

The action succeeded.

IC_CONFIG_INVALID_CRC 

The input install code has invalid crc.

IC_CONFIG_FAILED 

The action failed.

Definition at line 27 of file bdbInstallCode.h.

Function Documentation

void BDB_ConfigureInstallCode ( ExtAddr_t  deviceAddress,
uint8_t *  installCode,
IcStatusCallback_t  pfCallback 
)

bdb Public API to configure Install Code This API calculates the CRC for the install code and compare with the given CRC Derives the link key using SSP AES and sets the key in APS Key Pair Set

Parameters:
[in]deviceAddress- set to 0xffffffff in device or ext addr of the joining device
[in]installCode- pointer which holds the install code to be derived
[in]pfCallback- callback function to be called once the operation is finished
